title: august 15: a historic tweet
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about an important President Obama tweet. After, she remembers ABBA’s “Dancing Queen.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
